private_article_create.title: Create new Article
private_article_create.description: Create a new Article by sending article information

private_articles_search.title: Private Articles search
private_articles_search.description: Returns a list of private articles filtered by the search parameters

private_article_update.title: Update article
private_article_update.description: Updating an article by passing body parameters

private_article_authors_add.title: Add article authors
private_article_authors_add.description: Associate new authors with the article. This will add new authors to the list of already associated authors

private_article_authors_replace.title: Replace article authors
private_article_authors_replace.description: Associate new authors with the article. This will remove all already associated authors and add these new ones

private_article_categories_add.title: Add article categories
private_article_categories_add.description: Associate new categories with the article. This will add new categories to the list of already associated categories

private_article_categories_replace.title: Replace article categories
private_article_categories_replace.description: Associate new categories with the article. This will remove all already associated categories and add these new ones

private_article_embargo_delete.title: Delete Article Embargo
private_article_embargo_delete.description: Will lift the embargo for the specified article

private_article_embargo_details.title: Article Embargo Details
private_article_embargo_details.description: View a private article embargo details

private_article_embargo_update.title: Update Article Embargo
private_article_embargo_update.description: Note: setting an article under whole embargo does not imply that the article will be published when the embargo will expire. You must explicitly call the publish endpoint to enable this functionality.

private_article_upload_initiate.title: Initiate Upload
private_article_upload_initiate.description: Initiate new file upload within the article. Either use link to provide only an existing file that will not be uploaded on figshare or use the other 3 parameters(md5, name, size)

private_article_file.title: Single File
private_article_file.description: View details of file for specified article

private_article_private_link_create.title: Create private link
private_article_private_link_create.description: Create new private link for this article

private_article_private_link_delete.title: Disable private link
private_article_private_link_delete.description: Disable/delete private link for this article

private_article_private_link_update.title: Update private link
private_article_private_link_update.description: Update existing private link for this article

private_article_publish.title: Private Article Publish
private_article_publish.description:
- If the whole article is under embargo, it will not be published immediatly, but when the embargo expires or is lifted.
- When an article is published, a new public version will be generated. Any further updates to the article will affect the private article data. In order to make these changes publicly visible, an explicit publish operation is needed.

private_collection_create.title: Create collection
private_collection_create.description: Create a new Collection by sending collection information

private_collections_search.title: Private Collections Search
private_collections_search.description: Returns a list of private Collections

private_collection_articles_add.title: Add collection articles
private_collection_articles_add.description: Associate new articles with the collection. This will add new articles to the list of already associated articles

private_collection_articles_replace.title: Replace collection articles
private_collection_articles_replace.description: Associate new articles with the collection. This will remove all already associated articles and add these new ones

private_collection_authors_add.title: Add collection authors
private_collection_authors_add.description: Associate new authors with the collection. This will add new authors to the list of already associated authors

private_collection_authors_replace.title: Replace collection authors
private_collection_authors_replace.description: Associate new authors with the collection. This will remove all already associated authors and add these new ones

private_collection_categories_add.title: Add collection categories
private_collection_categories_add.description: Associate new categories with the collection. This will add new categories to the list of already associated categories

private_collection_categories_replace.title: Replace collection categories
private_collection_categories_replace.description: Associate new categories with the collection. This will remove all already associated categories and add these new ones

private_collection_private_link_delete.title: Disable private link
private_collection_private_link_delete.description: Disable/delete private link for this collection

private_collection_private_link_update.title: Update collection private link
private_collection_private_link_update.description: Update existing private link for this collection

private_collection_publish.title: Private Collection Publish
private_collection_publish.description: When a collection is published, a new public version will be generated. Any further updates to the collection will affect the private collection data. In order to make these changes publicly visible, an explicit publish operation is needed.

private_institution_accounts_list.title: Private Account Institution Accounts
private_institution_accounts_list.description: Returns the accounts for which the account has administrative privileges (assigned and inherited).

private_institution_accounts_create.title: Create new Institution Account
private_institution_accounts_create.description: Create a new Account by sending account information

private_institution_accounts_search.title: Private Account Institution Accounts Search
private_institution_accounts_search.description: Returns the accounts for which the account has administrative privileges (assigned and inherited).

private_institution_articles.title: Private Institution Articles
private_institution_articles.description: Get Articles from own institution. User must be administrator of the institution

private_institution_groups_list.title: Private Account Institution Groups
private_institution_groups_list.description: Returns the groups for which the account has administrative privileges (assigned and inherited).

private_institution_roles_list.title: Private Account Institution Roles
private_institution_roles_list.description: Returns the roles available for groups and the institution group.

private_account_institution_user.title: Private Account Institution User
private_account_institution_user.description: Retrieve institution user information using the account_id

private_licenses_list.title: Private Account Licenses
private_licenses_list.description: This is a private endpoint that requires OAuth. It will return a list with figshare public licenses AND licenses defined for account's institution.

private_project_delete.title: Delete project
private_project_delete.description:
A project can be deleted only if: - it is not public - it does not have public articles.

When an individual project is deleted, all the articles are moved to my data of each owner.

When a group project is deleted, all the articles and files are deleted as well. Only project owner, group admin and above can delete a project.

private_project_update.title: Update project
private_project_update.description: Updating an project by passing body parameters

private_project_articles_create.title: Create project article
private_project_articles_create.description: Create a new Article and associate it with this project

private_project_collaborators_list.title: List project collaborators
private_project_collaborators_list.description: List Project collaborators and invited users

private_project_collaborators_invite.title: Invite project collaborators
private_project_collaborators_invite.description: Invite users to collaborate on project or view the project

private_project_leave.title: Private Project Leave
private_project_leave.description: Please note: project's owner cannot leave the project.

private_project_publish.title: Private Project Publish
private_project_publish.description: Publish a project. Possible after all items inside it are public

file_download.title: Public File Download
file_download.description: Starts the download of a file

institution_hrfeed_upload.title: Private Institution HRfeed Upload
institution_hrfeed_upload.description: More info in the HR Feed section
